page.title: 04A Killamarsh Shop-Keeper
page.content: We walked down to the Shopping Centre in Killamarsh and talked to the shop-keeper of a fruit and vegetable shop. He came outside and sat with us on a bench outside the shop. We asked him how many customers he had each day and he told us that at the weekend he has between two and three thousand but in the week only two or three hundred a day. He starts work at 7.30 in the morning when he goes to Parkway Market in Sheffield to buy his fruit and vegetables. He opens his shop at 9 o'clock and closes it at 5.30. Everyone who works in the shop gets time off for dinner but the never closes for dinner except on Wednesday which is half day closing. He has four weeks holiday each year and when he goes away a manager takes his place. He has three other shops - in Worksop, Chesterfield and Sheffield.
